Class SudokuGame

java.lang.Object
  SudokuGame

public class SudokuGame
extends java.lang.Object

A SodokuGame allows a player to play a single Sudoku game.

Field Summary
private  info.gridworld.grid.Grid<Number> grid
          The grid for the game which is always filled with numbers
private  Puzzle puzzle
          The puzzle to be solved

Constructor Detail

SudokuGame

public SudokuGame(info.gridworld.grid.Grid<Number> g,
                  Puzzle p)
Constructor which initializes the game.
Initializes the instance varaibles and fills in the grid with Number objects.

Parameters:
g - the grid to be used
p - the puzzle to be used
Method Detail

cheat

public void cheat(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
Cheats for a specific location. If the Number object a loc is not part of the original puzzle then replace it with an appropriate cheating value.

Parameters:
loc - the location

solve

public void solve()
Solves the puzzle by cheating for each location.

clearLocation

public void clearLocation(info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
Clears the cell at location loc by placing a Player's Number object with value 0 at that location.

Parameters:
loc - the location to be cleared

clearBoard

public void clearBoard()
Clears by board by calling clearLocation for each cell on the board.

makePlay

public void makePlay(int value,
                     info.gridworld.grid.Location loc)
Plays value at location loc if it does not conflict with another number on the board. Otherwise it pops up an error message and restores the board to its original state.
Also, if this play solves the puzzle, a appropriate pop up is displayed.

Parameters:
value - the number to be "played".
loc - the location to be "played".

boardIsOK

public boolean boardIsOK()
Checks the board for conflicts.

Returns:
true if there are no conflicts; false otherwise.

boardIsSolved

public boolean boardIsSolved()
Checks to see if the puzzle is solved. (All rows, columns, and boxes add to 45).

Returns:
true if the puzzle is solved; false otherwise.

rowsAreOK

private boolean rowsAreOK()
Checks to see if all the rows in the puzzle have no duplicate entries.

Returns:
true if all the rows have no duplicates; false otherwise;

colsAreOK

private boolean colsAreOK()
Checks to see if all the columns in the puzzle have no duplicate entries.

Returns:
true if all the columns have no duplicates; false otherwise;

boxesAreOK

private boolean boxesAreOK()
Checks to see if all the boxes in the puzzle have no duplicate entries.

Returns:
true if all the boxes have no duplicates; false otherwise;

rowIsOK

private boolean rowIsOK(int r)
Checks to see if a row in the puzzle has no duplicate entries.

Parameters:
r - the row to check (0 <= r < 9)
Returns:
true if the row is solved; false otherwise;

colIsOK

private boolean colIsOK(int c)
Checks to see if a column in the puzzle has no duplicate entries.

Parameters:
c - the column to check (0 <= c < 9)
Returns:
true if the column is solved; false otherwise;

boxIsOK

private boolean boxIsOK(int initRow,
                        int initCol)
Checks to see if a box in the puzzle has no duplicate entries.

Parameters:
initRow - the row of the top left corner of the box to check (initRow is 0, 3, or 6).
initCol - the column of the top left corner of the box to check (initCol is 0, 3, or 6).
Returns:
true if the box is solved; false otherwise;

rowsAreSolved

private boolean rowsAreSolved()
Checks to see if all the rows in the puzzle are solved (add to 45).

Returns:
true if all rows are solved; false otherwise;

colsAreSolved

private boolean colsAreSolved()
Checks to see if all the columns in the puzzle are solved (add to 45).

Returns:
true if all column are solved; false otherwise;

boxesAreSolved

private boolean boxesAreSolved()
Checks to see if all the boxes in the puzzle are solved (add to 45).

Returns:
true if all boxes are solved; false otherwise;

rowIsSolved

private boolean rowIsSolved(int r)
Checks to see if a row in the puzzle is solved (adds to 45).

Parameters:
r - the row to sum (0 <= r < 9)
Returns:
true is the row sum is 45; false otherwise.

colIsSolved

private boolean colIsSolved(int c)
Checks to see if a col in the puzzle is solved (adds to 45).

Parameters:
c - the column to sum (0 <= c < 9)
Returns:
true is the col sum is 45; false otherwise.

boxIsSolved

private boolean boxIsSolved(int initRow,
                            int initCol)
Checks to see if a box in the puzzle is solved (adds to 45).

Parameters:
initRow - the row of the top left corner of the box to sum (initRow is 0, 3, or 6).
initCol - the column of the top left corner of the box to sum (initCol is 0, 3, or 6).
Returns:
true is the box sum is 45; false otherwise.
